item.title: Getting Started with PyTorch
item.description: (Py)Torch is a great C++/Python library to construct and train complex neural networks. It has taken over academia over the last few years and is slowly taking over industry. Let’s learn about how it works! This document is meant to be read cover-to-cover. It makes NO SENSE unless read like that. I focus on building intuition about why PyTorch works, so we will be writing unorthodox code until the very end where we put all ideas together.
